Action.author: skarim
Action.body: ~adc Can you please take a look this? ~ptippett has been running into this issue with a customer, who can't get an identity to have the 'hf.AffiliationMgr' attribute.

Action.author: ptippett
Action.body: ~adc Thanks for looking at this. If this can be done relatively quickly, can you prioritize it high? We have one customer hitting this now and I'd rather roll this fix out in our next push vs having to manually add attributes to mysql individually. Thanks!

Action.author: caod
Action.body: tagged with v1.4.7 for now until v1.4.8 tag is created
